title: Close friends
text: Can you make the green circle go away/be optional so others aren‚Äôt aware they are on my close friends list?!? Or maybe only the account holder can see the color circle so they are aware it‚Äôs only sharing to close friends. I love the idea of sharing with specific people without having to share to everyone who follows you, but I am not a fan of my followers knowing they are on my close friends list. In addition, it would be convenient to have multiple ‚Äúclose friends‚Äù list filters for different people who follow you, like family only is a purple circle, college friends only a red circle, maybe even a female/male followers only setting that allows you to share stories, posts, take polls, etc with only specified followers? Like I want to share pictures of my kids with just my family in my story, but I want to share funny memes with my college friends not my family but also not other followers it‚Äôs irrelevant to or may offend. All organized in different color lists by the account holder. Going thru each individual story settings and blocking each profile is tedious.

title: Meta hates you
text: Since Meta took over Instagram, they have actively made the app harder and less intuitive to use.  The algorithm pushes you content that has nothing to do with the accounts that you follow and seems to push polarizing content the hardest. Expect to see one ad per community created post and they removed the ability to see posts from the accounts that you follow in chronological order, your experience is at the mercy of the ruthless Ai bots. title: Fix your annoying bugs
text:
Okay there‚Äôs many things wrong with this app
1. The ‚Äúno internet connection‚Äù bug and the bug where you have to reload your chats for new messages to appear. It‚Äôs been happening for months and it‚Äôs annoying, I thought I was the only one but clearly there are more ppl with this bug. Fix it.

2. The hypocritical report system. Instagram reel comments are literally known to be horrible, especially towards black people. If someone says the most diabolical thing about black people, instagram wont bat an eye. You can say the n word and everything.  But just saying ‚Äúcracker‚Äù or ‚Äúwhite peoeple‚Äù will get your comment deleted. Very hypocritical.

Your app would be awesome if there wasn‚Äôt so many bugs and hypocrisy with the report system, but unfortunately you will only care once a huge amount of people leave the appü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
